Hardware Web API feature detection

tool Chrome web browser
features hardware Web geolocation BLE WebUSB

Code

Download code View demo web-hw-feature-detection-demo.html

Description

This example contains feature detection code in JavaScript. Load the HTML file file via a server on different browsers to see whether geolocation, Web BLE and Web USB are supported.

Chrome

![]http://localhost:4000/assets/images/tutorials/web-hw-feature-detection-chrome.png)

Safari

![]http://localhost:4000/assets/images/tutorials/web-hw-feature-detection-safari.png)

References

  2. Geolocation browser compatibility
  3. Web BLE API specification
  4. Web BLE browser compatibility
  5. Web USB API specification
  6. Web USB browser compatibility
